page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content:
The swimming pool was built in 1913, then it was owned by Balland Huyshe who built it out of a clay pit.He used it as a swimming pool for children whoes parents had gone abroad.The children would stay in village and go to the pool every day.In the war it was used as a rubbish dump.In 1955/1956 it was given to the village by the Huyshe family, since there has been huts and changing rooms installed.The pool holds 70000 gallons of water.
The village hall is near the swimming pool it was built in 1976,it is used for dances, plays, jumble sales, auctions and is general public use.An oak tree was planted for the Silver Jubilee there.
